title: Cisco Launches Comprehensive Security Architecture for Industrial IoT
snippet: Today, Cisco introduced an IoT security architecture that provides enhanced visibility across both IT and OT environments, and protects industrial processes.

summary: Cisco announced a comprehensive IoT security architecture designed to enhance visibility across both IT and operational technology (OT) environments. The solution aims to protect industrial processes by providing integrated security capabilities for connected IoT devices and infrastructure, addressing the growing security challenges in industrial and smart building environments.

title: Vertiv Critical Digital Infrastructure Solutions for Data Centers
snippet: Vertiv offers critical infrastructure technologies and rapidly-deployable customized solutions to meet specific business requirements and needs.
description: Vertiv's portfolio of critical infrastructure technologies including power management, thermal management, and prefabricated modular solutions for data centers.
summary: Vertiv is a global leader in critical digital infrastructure offering solutions for data centers including UPS systems, thermal management, liquid cooling, and prefabricated modular solutions. The company provides AI-ready infrastructure, hybrid cooling technologies, and complete power management systems for hyperscale, colocation, and enterprise data centers. Their offerings include the MegaMod HDX for AI/HPC and EnergyCore lithium-ion battery systems for backup power.

The initiative responds to increased interest from industry professionals seeking confidence in deploying these systems.

The company has over 1,000 installations globally and continues expanding deployments across data centers, commercial buildings, and DC-powered applications.

title: VoltServer Appoints Dave Johnson as Chief Executive Officer
snippet: As the recognized leader in fault-managed power, we enable infrastructure across telecom, transportation, enterprise, and industrial markets to meet the demands ...
